content.en: Tumor spheroid analysis: Scientists are developing user-friendly software applications and algorithms to accurately measure the size of tumor spheroids, which are used in cancer research. They are also using algorithms to analyze the viability, morphology, and invasion of these spheroids, as well as to track the spreading of multicellular tumor spheroids. Additionally, algorithms are being used to assess drug efficacy and penetration in these 3D cell cultures. These advancements in image analysis and computational approaches are helping researchers gain a better understanding of cancer and develop more effective treatments.
content.da: Tumorsfæranoid analyse: Forskere udvikler brugervenlige softwareapplikationer og algoritmer til at måle størrelsen af tumorsfæranoider, som anvendes i kræftforskning. De bruger også algoritmer til at analysere levedygtigheden, morfologien og invasionen af disse sfæroider, samt til at spore spredningen af multicellulære tumorsfæranoider. Desuden benyttes algoritmer til at vurdere lægemidlers effektivitet og penetration i disse 3D cellekulturer. Disse fremskridt inden for billedanalyse og beregningsmæssige tilgange hjælper forskere med at opnå en bedre forståelse af kræft og udvikle mere effektive behandlinger.
